citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process. The inspector arrived
to the facility, 05JUN2025 at 8:38 am. The inspector called and left the licensee a voicemail with his contact information.
The gate to the facility was closed and locked and the inspector honked car horn and shouted then waited 30 minutes
with no response. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process. The inspector arrived 
to the facility, 05JUN2025 at 8:38 am. The inspector called and left the licensee a voicemail with his contact information. 
The gate to the facility was closed and locked and the inspector honked car horn and shouted then waited 30 minutes 
with no response. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the 
AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
